sentences.sContent: She was hit by flying debris from the blast.
sentences.sCn: 她被爆炸产生的飞散碎片击中。

sentences.sContent: ...mixed in with other human debris such as plastic bags and old toys...
...Usually when we walk through the rain forest we hear a soft sound from all the moist leaves and organic debris on the forest floor...

trans.tranOther: the pieces of something that are left after it has been destroyed in an accident, explosion etc
